name: Late Sleep
description:
Late Sleep  is a small puzzle game in which you'll have to exit rooms while remembering some hidden obstacles and collecting all yellow dots.

Made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 68: Sleep. The limitation was: "No Text"

Mini jam is a 72-hour-long, game development jam for independent game developers that occurs every two weeks.

Rules

Use your mouse on the circle, and drag to draw the route. Try to collect all yellow dots, avoid hidden red dots and reach the exit, represented by an arrow. Finally, shut down your PC and go to sleep!
